instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2519: What is 820-2519? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.
definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_BC_ACOK: What is SMC_BC_ACOK? This is identical to CHGR_ACOK. This will come out of the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging chip when CHGR_ACIN & CHGR_DCIN are present, and is necessary for the onewire circuit to begin working. On most Macbooks, CHGR_ACOK needs to be present in order for PP3V42_G3H to flow to the onewire circuit so that the circuitry that allows the charger to communicate with the SMC will turn on.  .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
threads.message:
HI,
No power or green light on <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>. No liquid on board. ACOK is low.

PPBUS - 12.25V
PP3V42 - 3.483V
ACOK - .037V
ACOK in Diode - .470
pin 27/28 - 20OH
pin 17/18 -3 Ohm

Already changed <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP>

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
threads.message:
ACIN value?
Do you get corect 3V42?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
threads.message: Check <RESISTOR>R5087</RESISTOR>; you can force it to 100K...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
threads.message:
Getting 115K from <RESISTOR>R5087</RESISTOR>.

Thats supposed to be  a 470K resistor...


Thanks.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
threads.message: 4.97K on pin 1 of <RESISTOR>R5087</RESISTOR>. Short on SMC side?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2519</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no power/green light. Acok low
threads.message:
Try to reflow SMC with good flux...
If doesn't help, remove it; don't forget to check ACOK before resolder other SMC.
